org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet

Class BasicRestObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.RestObject
      • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.BasicRestObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicJsonConfig, DefaultConfig, BasicRestOperations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicRestObjectGroup, HelloWorldResource, HelloWorldResource, HelloWorldResource, HtmlBeansResource, RequestEchoResource, UtilityBeansResource

    public abstract class BasicRestObject
extends RestObject
implements BasicRestOperations, BasicJsonConfig
    Identical to BasicRestServlet but doesn't extend from HttpServlet.

    Meant as a base class for child REST resources in servlet containers and Spring Boot environments.

    Provides basic JSON support by implementing the BasicJsonConfig interface. Other language types can be added via the @Rest(serializers)/@Rest(parsers) annotations or by adding one of the predefined interfaces in org.apache.juneau.rest.config.

    Implements the basic REST endpoints defined in BasicRestOperations.

    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > @Rest-Annotated Classes
